show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita and the Birth of Japan
other_title: Eiga Doraemon: Nobita no Nippon Tanjō (Japanese)
哆啦A梦：大雄的日本诞生 (Chinese (PRC))
映画ドラえもん のび太の日本誕生 (Japanese)
電影多啦A夢：大雄之日本誕生 (Chinese (Hong Kong))
plot: As Doraemon, Nobita, Shizuka, Jyaian, and Suneo decide to run away from their homes, they flee towards 70,000 years back in time. After a brief exploration of prehistoric Japan, they end up meeting Kururu, a boy from the primitive era. To help him reunite with his tribe, Doraemon and the gang will need to fight a shaman from another tribe who has captured Kururu's kin to work as slaves.
